landing-page.title: FitTraining
landing-page.description: Discover your fitness paradise! Start your journey towards a healthier and stronger you with us. From personalized workouts to expert guidance, we are here to support your goals. Join our vibrant community and unleash your potential today!

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.
